title: Python Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Python programming with hands-on exercises and real-world examples. Perfect for beginners who want to start their coding journey.

title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript and learn to create interactive web pages. Build your first dynamic websites with modern JavaScript.

title: Advanced Python
description: Dive deep into advanced Python concepts including object-oriented programming, decorators, and data structures for experienced programmers.

title: Web Development with JavaScript
description: Build complete web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries. Learn to create responsive and interactive websites.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python libraries like pandas, matplotlib, and scikit-learn.

title: Game Development Basics
description: Create your first games using Python and Pygame. Learn game design principles and bring your creative ideas to life.
